text: L'Échappée belle, an album by Autour de Lucie, was released in 1994 on the Nettwerk label. It was re-released by Nettwerk and Le Village Vert under the title Autour De Lucie with a bonus track, "Simon". ==Track listing== # "L'accord parfait" # "La ballade du déserteur" # "Les ciels de traîne" # "Le tournesol" # "Island" # "Comme si de rien n'était" # "Au large déjà" # "Ce que l'on tait" # "Les anomalies" # "Marie (ceux qui ne rêvent pas aux étoiles)" # "Les brouillons" ==External links== * Lyrics for L'Échappée belle Category:Autour de Lucie albums Category:1994 debut albums
title: L'Échappée belle
